website_summaries.verdict: The gold standard – pun intended – in privacy screens, this model not only replaces the usual black version in looks, but provides better clarity.
pros: Outside the 60-degree viewing angle, the screen looks glossy and gold while providing excellent privacy
Filter allows users to see better than with black screen in areas with poor lighting
Can flip over and use black side if needed
Easy to install, remove, and clean
cons: May cause a glare in bright light
Some users find the cost a bit steep
Adhesive tabs holding filter in place are somewhat intrusive

customer_reviews.title: The best privacy filter available. Get the gold.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 14" Lenovo T460 Perfectly! Worried I needed the "high resolution" version of this but the quality of the filter is fine and can see everything without any strange artifacts. Not sure what people are complaining about but this Gold filter is the perfect privacy solution. It actually looks red when viewed from a side angle. If you are looking directly into the screen, it will appear very slightly tinted grey and from a side angle appears like a very reflective gold redish tone. Very nice. It will not stop someone standing right behind you or only at a very slight angle but provides peace of mind for casual glances. Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: JJGuy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't rate this 5 stars because it doesn't hold well if you constantly take it on and off. If you are ok leaving it on most of the time, it's freaking great. Not only does it look really cool to people who walk by, they can't see your screen unless they're right behind you. It's amazing how well this actually works. And unlike the cheaper ones, it doesn't dim the screen or color very much at all. Worth the higher price as you definitely get what you pay for. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought a different brand privacy filter and it sucked--didn't do anything other than slightly darken the screen from the side. Everything was still very readable. Read more reviews and bought the GOLD 3M privacy filter. It is a game changer. Impossible to see through unless you are sitting directly behind the screen. This privacy filter hits the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Clearer than the dark black screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: If someone is sitting behind as in a classroom, they might can still see the screen if it is bright enough. For a darker background, it might be a little more difficult to see. On either side of me, they will only be able to see a gold screen. I wish it was a little darker so no one could see behind me while in a classroom setting. I really like the plastic tabs that hold the screen in place. Need to keep a microfiber cloth handy for fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Dont use the adhesive strips.
customer_reviews.text: The filter does a good of masking the screen from certain angles. You will be given two options to apply the filter; dont use the adhesive strips. I gave it three because I had to replace a screen on my notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product :( So, I learned to turn my laptop brightness to its lowest setting. I juked and jived my laptop screen and I could still see my desktop clear as day. Stepped farther away and did a left, right, left multiple times and the coverage is disappointing. The anxiety of what people can see on my screen has been replaced with WHAT ANGLE they can see the stuff on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my HP Probook 640 G2 laptop 14" screen. I agree with one of the previous reviews. Although it is advertised as dual side capable (gray color side or reflective gold color side). The reflective gold color side works better for privacy. The self-adhering plastic tabs that hold the privacy filter in-place works well. I suggest that you use some screen or glass cleaner to wipe clean the screen and bezel free from dust before you apply the tabs and privacy filter.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: Maximum privacy for your laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these Gold privacy filters and highly recommend them. While they are more expensive than others, whatever coating technology that 3M has developed works great and provides the level of privacy I need - especially when traveling. For those of you who travel a lot, you notice that seats are much closer together. The Gold filters protect your laptop screen from people who are sitting next to you. I've tested it with people on both Southwest and American. No one could see the screen. Installation is easy with multiple plastic tabs holding the filter in place. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY .. for MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a bezel around your laptop screen, the recommended removable attachment instructions will not work. My MacBook is a flat screen. The plastic tabs are flush to the screen and they don't provide plastic tabs that are raised high enough to allow the screen to slide in. For a $50+ piece of plastic, I'm sure 3m could do better. (And attaching permanently is not an acceptable option.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Slip N Slide for $36
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12.5 screen assuming it would be 12.5 inches long. Instead it's closer to 11 inches long and the instructions for installation were very unclear, and it does not adhere to my screen. I don't have enough time in my day to spend an hour trying to figure out how to get this thing to work properly, and to even spend more time trying to talk to customer service and return it. Very vague labeling and instructions. Perhaps 3M can consider providing a video of how to install since their "written" instructions are so ambiguous.
customer_reviews.author: ErH

customer_reviews.title: Handy for privacy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Don't like the fact I can see the adhesive strips at the edges where it attaches to the screen. When I need to take the filter off, it peels off fairly easily and slips easily back into place. I travel for work and having this privacy filter keeps my confidential work confidential. It doesn't take much of movement off-center for the filter to kick in. Of course, it's passive so it's not kicking in literally. Dig the orange color, too. I need to get one for my personal laptop next.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: You lose touch screen abilities
customer_reviews.text: This fits an Acer 15 Chromebook, which is awesome, so noisy people at Starbucks and Panera can mind their business. Also perfect on crowded airplanes. You do lose the touchscreen abilities, but not a game changer. My "old school " wired mouse works perfectly for flights for scrolling.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but super expensive
customer_reviews.text: Is it me or does this price point seem a bit ridiculous for a piece of plastic that covers your computer? Overall, the item works fine. I have the gold privacy filter one. I stuck the side stickers on and it is easy to remove and put back on the screen once installed. It does signficantly dim the visibility of your screen. but it works great for airplane rides and etc. but this price point is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Steph F

customer_reviews.title: A moderate improvement in privacy
customer_reviews.text: I found this filter to be just OK, it does prevent peeking eyes away from your screen, as long as they're by your side. The viewing angle is somewhere around 45 degrees, so anybody standing slightly behind you will have partial or total view of your screen. I'd prefer a narrower angle, even if it sacrifices brightness.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: you need to hold it by the edges - otherwise it attracts fingerprints like no other
customer_reviews.text: The filter is okay, but there are several problems with it. First, you need to hold it by the edges - otherwise it attracts fingerprints like no other. Second, the plastic adhesive tabs, which purport to allow you to slide it on and off, are terrible at their intended design. I just affixed it with a few pieces of clear tape (not attractive, but it works). Third, the filter greatly dims the brightness of my screen and makes it difficult to read, even with the brightness up to full. Net-net - I needed the filter for privacy when flying. Otherwise, I wouldn't bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as advertised. No one sitting to either side of me can see my screen. As long as I'm sitting in front of the screen, I have no visibility issues. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Audy Joy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but a little bit of glare on bright days.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate security shade for my laptop. One thing i hate most is people looking over my shoulders at my screen and information. This one is awesome and fit my hp laptop awesomely. :)
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Best privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen to replace a broken Surface, this fits my new Dell Latitude perfect. It is easy to put on, also it fits the screen perfect. I absolutely like the quality and feel of it. Durability I hear from my co-workers who have it extremely dependable. I simply love it. Winston
customer_reviews.author: Winston M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, quality on both matte (black) and glossy (red-gold) privacy filter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Samsung NP300V5A-A02US and it fits perfectly. The matte/black side of the screen isn't as matte as I'd like, but it is better than the gold. Both sides do a good job but the black side is less conspicuous. Privacy filters are not perfect but they help tremendously. Don't expect magic. Supplement privacy filters with other techniques if you can like through thematic obfuscation. I don't find the model number "watermark" even noticable most of the time. I notice it more often on the golden side of the filter. (You can always insert the screen upside down if you like. I would buy another of these for other devices if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kurowski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: You cannot see anything on the screen unless you are almost straight behind it. This works perfectly, worth every penny. I have bought one for every computer I have owned since I became aware of them (review written in 2018)
customer_reviews.author: K-USA

customer_reviews.title: 100% Blackout privacy. Excellent for airplane office work!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and works perfectly. I do a lot of work on flights and unless you are seated directly behind me this screen provides 100% black out privacy. Even if you are standing in the aisle above my seated position, you cannot see the screen. I'm recommending these to many colleagues too. Buy the best, 3M is a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: birkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used these for some years on all of our machines... best I’ve found in terms of both keeping prying eyes away - but also keeping the display from being overly impacted for the user. Highly recommend - well worth the extra money over some of the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: jwasmn

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased like new repackaged. I assumed there would be a small amount of damage around the edges but there is a moon shaped indent in the middle of the sheet. At times it is distracting or even obstructive when I am trying to work. I wanted to prevent others from viewing my screen, not myself.
customer_reviews.author: I. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: They're wonderful. I like that now they have a way ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot understand why more people don't protect their privacy while on their computers. I have been using these for probably 10 years, at least 3 computers. They're wonderful. I like that now they have a way to adhere to the computer where there's no visible tabs. And when I wrote to #M for extras to redo the privacy screen on my older computer, they sent the adhesives for no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: I sit at a place where the lights are just ...
customer_reviews.text: I sit at a place where the lights are just over and behind me, the screen filter makes visibility difficult and all I can see is the people movement and stuff behind my back , I have even tried adjusted the display brightness but to no effect, Everytime I have to use this I have to adjust the screen angle but I can still see all the movement behind me back in the screen filter which makes my work so very difficult with the filter on.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Chug

customer_reviews.title: Measure before buying!
customer_reviews.text: Measure, Measure!! Before ordering find a website that shows you how to measure your laptop for a privacy filter. It was very misleading and after I received I went back and looked at it again and I did measure it correctly and matched the model number of my laptop as one that this would fit but it was too small for the screen and the cut out for the camera built into my laptop did not match at all.......disappointed at this price. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Screen does a great job keeping unwanted eyes from viewing my laptop screen
customer_reviews.text: **Please click on HELPFUL if you found this helped in your product search.** Screen does a great job keeping unwanted eyes from viewing my laptop screen. Unlike other models, I really like the adhesive glue directly on the screen that can be removed without any residue on my laptop screen. I stays attached firmly and there are no tabs to deal with. It has a black or gold option, with the black being more anti-glare, but I use the gold side which is a little more clear. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: citadel1980

customer_reviews.title: It works better than the black privacy screens but it doesn't really ...
customer_reviews.text: It works better than the black privacy screens but it doesn't really work for touchscreens (ThinkPad x240 12.5W viewable screen). It just covers the viewable screen so there isn't space to adhere it on the outside using the tape option and the tabs are too flush to easily put on and take off the screen. I'm trying the 14.1" and cutting it down to size which would give me enough space to adhere it to the non-viewable portion of the screen. Oh, and I have the black version of the 12.5W that is made specifically for the x240 but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ann T. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely The Best!
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best privacy filter I have ever used! I've tried several others, but at the right angle, anybody could see my computer screen. With this gold privacy screen, most people think I'm crazy and looking at a blank computer. You literally have to be directly in front of the computer screen to be able to see what's on it. Comes in handy during college classes, on airplanes, in waiting rooms, or any other place where what you're doing is none of anybody else's business!
customer_reviews.author: Bannan

customer_reviews.title: Hands down one of the best privacy filters I used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best filters I used..the gold filter is simply awesome..from both privacy and looks stand point..I had multiple people asking me about it after seeing on my laptop
customer_reviews.author: walker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Just as described!! Fast shipping but unfortunately the screen was too small and had to return but they had a very quick refund process. I would definitely order from again :) Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I'm just using the piece of plastic as for my needs. The static electricity keeps it in place.
customer_reviews.author: LCP

customer_reviews.title: The WOW Factor!!
customer_reviews.text: Whoever thought you would talk about the WOW factor when discussing a privacy screen? Well, this screen has the WOW factor. People are amazed by this screen, and frequently ask me where I bought it. That speaks for itself. In short, the viewing angles are extremely sharp. A person sitting beside me in a conference room can see pretty much nothing. Nothing but gold that is. Well worth the money for people working in an office. As a contractor, I frequently have to write and read emails that are for my eyes only. This screen ensures that they stay for my eyes only. Great product 3M!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Leavell

customer_reviews.title: Privacy Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Got for my husband who travels for work. Now he does not have to worry about strangers viewing his laptop while he is working. You have to sit directly in front, up close to it in order to be able to read the screen. This is a great little devise.
customer_reviews.author: JenC

customer_reviews.title: I like this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does not dim screen as much as black ones. I do not see a lot of these so glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product. I was worried that this would not fit into my Inspiron Gaming 7566 because in the specs it was a militer wider tan my monitor. At the end, it fixed correctly. The only thing that I don't like, is that there's a space in the upper side of the filter and you can see the screen. As I try to make it pass as if this were how my monitor looks normally, I had to place tape in this space. I would preffer that the monitor covered completely the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent a used screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen packaging had been opened and taped shut. The inner plastic cover had been opened and there were fingerprint smudges and dust all over the screen. Also, you had to rotate the screen slightly to get a clear view of the laptop screen, otherwise there were faint diagonal lines all across the screen.
customer_reviews.author: John Pabst Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Gold is always best
customer_reviews.text: This privacy screen really works. Unless someone has their head on your shoulder, your screen cannot be seen. I heard about this model from my IT co-workers. The Gold color is the best for blocking uninvited viewing of my screen. The material has enough thickness and yet flexibility to make it very durable. It also does not get out of position with the constant closing and opening of my laptop as I move from meeting to meeting. Paying it forward.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: nice color and recommended in public spaces
customer_reviews.text: great for snooping eyes. i use this in public and on the subway. keeps privacy in front of me and no one to the side can see what i'm doing. though people behind you can see. the only downside is that people behind you for 20 feet can see the screen but i would really recommend it because it works well.

customer_reviews.title: HUrts my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This screen looked like a good idea at the beginning. It protected my screen from people just walking behind me in the office. The issue I have is that after using the screen for 1 hour or 2 my eyes start hurting pretty bad and I sometimes get a headache. Not sure if this is normal for everyone by the strain I get to the eyes is not worth the benefit. Also the brightness of screen is pretty diminished. In my opinion, unless you are working on something highly confidential, its not worth to put the screen on.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Privacy everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: A coworker had this item and it was eye catching when you first see it. As I passed his desk all I could see was what looked like gold foil. So I got one for my lappy and it fit perfect. Putting the little tabs on can be a little confusing if you've never dealt with this type of privacy screen. I found one long tabs near the bottom on each side worked with one small tab in the center top and center bottom. I pull mine off frequently when working with others, so it has held up wonderful thus far. Again, best price for this was on Amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles21

customer_reviews.title: Great Privacy Screen
customer_reviews.text: Fit my screen perfectly (thank you included accurate dimensions), and came with adhesive strips that securely connected it to my screen. Viewing angle is narrow enough to do its job, while making it easy to see for me as a user. Two very minor drawbacks:1) it does dim the overall brightness of the screen a bit. 2) the screen attracts dust easily. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Annette Knebl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ASUS ROG gaming laptop. It doesn't quite have the exact same aspect ratio so the extreme left and right edges are not covered while there is a little extra jotting out on top and bottom. Aside from this it works perfectly, no one can see my screen except they stand directly behind. Used the gold side facing out.
customer_reviews.author: Lolu Ayodeji

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great privacy screen. Has more of a "reddish" metallic tint to it rather than gold. Easy to install. Only con is the small semi-circle cut out for either installing or for a cam. Since the filter tones down the brightness of the screen, that cut out allows the brighter screen light to come through. The adhesive that holds it on to either side is noticeable as well with brighter screen backgrounds. No big deal to me, but it is noticeable. Great filter overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: TOO MANY AIR BUBBLES!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this filter to come! However, when I got the filter and placed it on my laptop screen, air bubbles appeared on the screen. I made sure both my computer screen and the actual filter were clean and dried. I've put the screen on 10 different ways and the bubbles still form! This is very distracting when working on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best privacy screen so far
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best privacy screen so far, does what all do, but the added iridium/gold prevents nosy neighbors on the plane from seeing anything better than the regular black ones, also lets more light shine through so you can actually see your screen when there is a decent amount of light around you. I would definitely recommend this guy over any other ones
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: This is my second 3M Gold privacy screen on a 2nd replacement notebook and
customer_reviews.text: This privacy protector does not seem to have the off angle viewing protection my 3 year old 3M gold privacy protector had. The screen "blacks out" only when you are on a very far angle to it's side. My prior privacy screen protector would show a black screen for those sitting beside me as close as on a plane or in a meeting but this seems to require you to be further to the side and further away from the screen in terms of depth to achieve the same privacy
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking Gold Privacy Cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 14" chromebook with adhesive tabs that secure the cool looking gold color privacy screen. Provides great privacy from the wandering eyes of those sitting next to you depending on the angle of their view. Makes it easier to take notice of those who may be really trying to look at your screen. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PsyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Best privacy filter on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best privacy filter I've found. Not only does the filter protect your screen from prying eyes, but also helps prevent eye strain when working on your computer on hours end.
customer_reviews.author: Texas-Ex NYC Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The viewing angle is bigger than I expected it to be even with the filter on, and I'm using the gold one which was repeatedly stated in reviews here to do better than the all black. Better than nothing, but pricey for IMO minimal effect. I won't be getting any more for my other computers.
customer_reviews.author: RaymondReddington17

customer_reviews.title: I held off on 5 stars because I do not like the slide in mounting tabs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new 12" retina Macbook. This fits the screen to the exact size. I held off on 5 stars because I do not like the slide in mounting tabs, they didn't hold so well at first. I have not touched it since installing and so far it has held.
customer_reviews.author: MarcWinNJ

customer_reviews.title: Privacy for Days
customer_reviews.text: These screens can be so expensive. Tried this one out and haven't looked back. Everyone from my office has them now. I always had to sit with my back to the door and hated that everyone could see everything I did. Now they still have to be wider than the viewing angle, so anyone behind you will still get a view but from the sides it's total darkness or a reflection. It's enough to keep eyes busy enough not to look/
customer_reviews.author: Scout TV

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of privacy when using the laptop in meetings
customer_reviews.text: Application: Adding privacy to my Company laptop Pros: Easy to apply Great amount of privacy except for 10' range immediately behind user Cons: Expensive (you get what you pay for) If someone is behind you they are still able to view the screen
customer_reviews.author: M S Mc Cright

customer_reviews.title: Privacy is only as good as the tabs holding it in place
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I was quite happy with this product. It provided the level of privacy I was looking for while traveling and in other public places. Unfortunately, from time to time it was necessary to take the filter off. The few adhesive tabs they give you don't hold up well with this. I could imagine if the tabs were designed slightly different this wouldn't have been much of an issue. If you can attach it to your laptop and don't need to remove it occasionally, then this would be what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These screens do everything they promise and more. It's impossible to see anything on the screen unless you're directly in front of it. People standing over you, next to you, or below you won't be able to see your screen. It works. I hate the price tag, but it's great for anyone that accesses private information that is meant to remain private. It's a must have for anyone that deals with health or finance records, or just wants check sports at work while looking busy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Gold is the new Black
customer_reviews.text: The gold filter works so well for myself, that I made sure all my cowrokers have them. It has been most handy while traveling on the plane, to prevent the nosey people next to you from reading your screen as you work. Seriously people, we SEE you. It was great to find this particular size when many places don't have it in stock. This fit our company laptops with a wide screen perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MzK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order the correct size for the model of your computer. I would want to try to cut this material. Thin but very stiff. All you see is good color from just a slight angle off center. I saved the cardboard sleeve it comes in to protect the filter when I'm not using it. when I'm using it I forget it even there after a minute or so. A must if you use your computer in public places with sensitive information.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good privacy filter - a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good privacy filter - a little pricey. I wish it had a little better diagonal filter and fit my particular laptop better - I didn't notice that it had specific laptops that it was designed for, but I may have missed it. Doesn't make the screen too dark - which is good for conserving energy
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Convenient product that offers sufficient privacy
customer_reviews.text: I like how it offers sufficient privacy for me to do my work anywhere, with the safe knowledge that people will not be able to see my screen. One problem I have is that it is hard to clean fingerprints and stains off it, and the plastic surface reflects light so it is hard to work on my laptop under sunlight or bright lights. The color of the filter also dims the brightness of my laptop screen so I have to turn up the level of brightness in order to achieve the same level of clarity..
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy
customer_reviews.text: Great privacy filter... you definitely can’t see through it from angles!
customer_reviews.author: MP Wtlnd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection form prying eyes. Needs to be easier to remove and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: What is the POINT if you can't attach it to your computer?
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't come with anything to actually attach it to your screen. Thanks for a useless piece of film.
customer_reviews.author: MegaKnitter

customer_reviews.title: Very good privacy filter
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these now on different laptops and use mine every day. They work well although I'll admit I never use the gold side. It's too reflective. Normally I flip it over and use the gray side. If you have a window directly behind you with a lot of light pouring in, neither side will work and you'll have to remove it to see your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Myke13

customer_reviews.title: Works Well - Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works well and keeps prying eyes from seeing your screen. This stays on most of the time as there is minimal attenuation for the direct on view. There is also the "cool" factor for the gold side of it. Not a great reason to buy, but the functionality is why you're using or considering one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tc

customer_reviews.title: I must say I love the gold
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Does exactly what it said that it would do. I must say I love the gold. Or you can flip to the other side for a dark screen. Looking for another gold privacy screen in another size. As noted though, if someone is directly behind you, they can still see your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of traveling and work on sensitive documents. I cannot be worried about people on the airplane or train looking at my screen to see sensitive trademark information or something as simple as logging into my bank and making a money transfer. This product works as advertised but is pricey. That said, everyone comments on the "coolness" or the gold reflection...and the fact that they can't see anything :>)
customer_reviews.author: Kingofbytes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airports
customer_reviews.text: This screen works so well. My old privacy screen did not block out my screen this much. Unless someone is standing right behind me, they can't see anything. Perfect for airports. My only concern is that it scratches easily. I don't like to keep mine on permanently so I don't use the tape strips. I only place it against my laptop screen when I get to the airport, so moving it to and from my laptop bag has put quite a few scratches on it...if you don't mind it looking a tad battered, then this is great. The scratches don't affect screen visibility so I am fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely GOLD!
customer_reviews.text: This work better than another brand I tried. I am just surprised how much the gold brightens up the keyboard. The instructions are not very clear even though they are written in 100 different languages. The cutout for the camera was way off center so it looks a little awkward and that is why only four stars. But just try and shoulder surf my computer. I will 3M gold your...butt!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but it's awful trying to keep it in place
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. It provides excellent privacy for your laptop screen and it does a good job keeping reflections from light sources from ruining your view, but the tabs that they include with the filter are problematic. If you have a thin bezel laptop, consider that the tabs may not stick well and that your screen may fall off often. Someone needs to come up with a better solution for holding the filter, because these sticky little tabs don't work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and fits the Asus K50 like a glove
customer_reviews.text: The gold filter just looks so neat. The privacy filter is brighter than the 3M one I have for my work laptop which is nice as my work laptop is pretty dim with the filter on. This one I can see clearly but look from an angle and all you see is a gold screen. Slick! This one is for my personal Asus K50 and it fits so well with enough static cling there is no need to install the plastic tabs to hold it in place!
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten one of these for each of my last three laptops. They prevent eavesdropping, and I've gotten numerous positive comments on the gold finish. It cleans easily with same products you'd use to clean an ordinary laptop screen. The stick-on guides that hold the screen in place have lasted for several years on all three laptops. Excellent product and for me it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Philbey

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate in privacy
customer_reviews.text: The screen is very easy to install. I needed the privacy as I had several trips scheduled including one overseas. The screen really limits any side viewing so it works well while in a plane or airport terminal. One slight issue is that if you are in a meeting and try to share something on your screen with them, you have to physically turn the laptop towards them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works just as promised - Quality needs improving
customer_reviews.text: The 3M Gold privacy filter works great - in fact it helps reading on-screen content unlike cheaper screens. If you do not like the shiny golden side you can flip it around for a plain black privacy screen (similar to all other privacy screens). Only one complaint - The build quality needs improvement. The gold and the black side are bound to each other by some material, after a few weeks of use (no removal or touching) the material starts to unbind itself resulting in separation of the two layers causing some visible issues. Over time this would only damage further and lead to deterioration of the product.
customer_reviews.author: FaeLLe

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this screen for over 2 years now. This privacy filter is superb in the function is was meant for. The viewing angle is greatly reduced and looks great. I get quite a few comments on how interesting this is. I love it because it keeps eyes off my screen when flying and in meetings. The only complaint I have is the redish film on the outside is starting to peel off in the corners. I have added clear tape to help keep it from peeling more but that has actually restricted my view on the lower corners of my screen. :-( Great screen filter but for the price I had expected the red film to last longer. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: OK, but highly reflective
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the prior generation of privacy filters, this one lacks a non-reflective side. One of the features I appreciated on the older filters was the matte side which is much more usable in backlit environments. This 15.6 format includes many laptops with glossy screens that are unusable in bright or backlit situations. I'm returning this and getting the older style of privacy filter.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product as always
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product as always, hate the price tag. After so many years of being available on the market, one would think the price would come down eventually or additional manufacturers would be available.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good privacy screen.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for blocking nosy people from viewing your screen clearly from the sides. I don't use it to protect any sensitive data - I bought it because I was tired of people silently creeping up next to me to look at my screen out of curiosity in public or at work. I didn't dislike people knowing what I was doing, just the way they would try to sneak up undetected, get a glance and then pretend like they were doing something else. For this purpose it has been an unmitigated success - if people are curious, they simply ask like normal people now.
customer_reviews.author: John Galster

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Get compliments on the cool gold color. Does make the screen a little tad fuzzy to read, so it has to be worth it to have it on. I liked that the plastic tabs that stick around the perimeter of the screen allow me to take it on and off easily. Would recommend and order again.
customer_reviews.author: pandash99

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector! The multicolor sheen really shields viewers from seeing whats on the screen. My only qualm would be that I have to take the screen of daily, and now the adhesive no longer will stick to my computer, so it just lays against the scree. Not ideal because it falls off and doesn't completely cover the screen. Otherwise i recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Overdid privacy-- Too glossy!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess they went a bit overboard with this privacy thing... but just missed to realize that the person sitting right in front of it should be able to see the screen without any issues.. Works like a charm when you are not in front , barely can see whats going on.But too glossy for the person sitting in front to see the screen clearly and i dint see any matt effect on one side which is how usually all these screens are designed.. Drop gold , go for carbon ( or regular)
customer_reviews.author: Arvind

customer_reviews.title: Slide mount tabs don't work
customer_reviews.text: 3M has a tool on its site to let you know which screens work with your exact computer model. Based on this I would expect the slide mounts to be strong enough to adhere to my monitor with the screen attached. I assumed wrong. The adhesive tabs work fine, but I don't expect them to work well for multiple removals, the use case I intended this purchase for.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: is super simple to mount and remove
customer_reviews.text: It fit my Lenovo T450 perfectly, is super simple to mount and remove, and works as advertised. I no longer wonder if people are looking over my shoulder if I am working on the train.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It look super nice and does not damage your laptop
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got the privacy I was looking for .. after 3 returns and long hours of searching this is what I was looking for, no stickers, no tags, no nothing and a lots of privacy, just place it on the screen of my 13' MacAir and my privacy starts. It look super nice and does not damage your laptop. I am super happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the image listing filter sizes
customer_reviews.text: There is an image listing the various models and their sizes. I selected this GF121W1B based on that table's size of 10-5/16" x 6-7/16" but the filter that arrived and claimed to be that model was 10.3" x 6.5" which is just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jennings

customer_reviews.title: marginal at best
customer_reviews.text: Applied to my pc and found all sorts of little odd shaped circles being created. Apparently there is a thing called wet out...where initial moisture in the air causes the screen to stick to the screen of the pc. This is not something they tell you about. The only solution is to rub the privacy screen on carpet - per 3m Instructions -which creates a fin layer of dust...preventing the wet out . Product sucks.
customer_reviews.author: tom b

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for working on the plane without having others being ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Have had several coworkers ask where I got it. Very useful for working on the plane without having others being nosy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G Todd

customer_reviews.title: The screen itself is great, but the adhesives provided as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen itself is great, but the adhesives provided as well as the documentation leave a lot to be desired. At the top of every page of instructions it looked like "Step #4", with you left wondering "hmm... where did step 1, 2, and 3" go. It was just a side effect of bad layout but this could have been more polished.
customer_reviews.author: George Mann

customer_reviews.title: Works well for intended purpose, just doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive doesn’t stick after a few times on/off. You’re better off using the side clips and sliding on and off instead of the adhesive. Both come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It fits my MacBook Pro (15-inch, Early 2011) like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Securing the Privacy Filter, albeit with few realistic options available, is a bit... primitive, though. I was hoping that the adhesion provided by a film of soap, mere static, or just plain luck might be enough, but alas, not wanting to affix sticky tape to my screen, I resorted to 3M's (provided) "Slide Mount Tabs". The Privacy Filter is quite considerable, at ~0.6mm thick, so keeping it positioned on a portable computer's display is an understandable balance between aesthetics, and physics.
customer_reviews.author: Karl H.

customer_reviews.title: good side to side.
customer_reviews.text: These privacy filters are great if you have someone sitting next to you at a conference or at a meeting, however they do not reduce or distort or hide the view from anyone sitting at the table behind you in a conference or coffee shop. i thought with the "Gold" privacy filter it would be a little better. overall i am satisfied. it does most of what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wayne Craft

customer_reviews.title: The perfect privacy filter for my laptop so that I am ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect privacy filter for my laptop so that I am HIPAA-compliant in my acupuncture practice with my Electronic Health Record system up during appointments!
customer_reviews.author: luv_huskies

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Use all the tabs
customer_reviews.text: The screen works well as a privacy filter. I like the golden red look. It does come with several tabs to attach around the filter to keep it in place. The directions tell you to decide just how many you want to use. After only using the two main tabs and misplacing the rest I need two more along the bottom. Great product, 3M needs to be more direct in the mounting instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cristel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as advertised. Stops nosey people beside you on airplanes from reading your screen. Tested it at home with my wife and she thought the computer was turned off when she was sitting beside me on the couch. Used it recently on a cross country flight with no problems. I confidently worked on sensitive documents the whole flight. Comes with two options for attaching to screen. I opted for the one where I can remove the screen and am very satisfied thus far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome filter. Needs protective sleave
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic privacy filter and fits my Dell 7480 laptop perfectly. But, I would have appreciated a protective sleave to store the filter when not in use. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Good for privacy, so so viewing
customer_reviews.text: It fits well. There is significant darkening of the screen so light output has to be increased. Also, in a bright room or bright wall behind you, the screen can be difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetRick

customer_reviews.title: Coworkers and strangers ask me for this link constantly
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this as a privacy filter all the time. The screen stays bright and clear when your actually looking at it straight on, but turn just a few degrees in any direction and it’s like the monitor is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Raven

customer_reviews.title: Right On!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and what I needed for my screen privacy.
customer_reviews.author: @SEA

customer_reviews.title: If you want privacy, this is money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: This screen offers the best privacy of any screen guard I have seen. Unless you are directly in front of it, you can not see the screen. This is perfect for Train and raids and airplane trips where working on my laptop in public. Its pricey but provides the privacy it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Aviram

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a privacy screen for online testing in college and this one works perfectly. I needed a screen that would protect my information from someone sitting beside me and this one works 100%
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Cantrell

product_meta.title: 3M Gold Privacy Filter for 14" Widescreen Laptop (GF140W9B) (16:9)
product_meta.description: Size:14.0" Widescreen Laptop3M Gold Privacy Filters keep confidential information private when working in public places. User sees clearly while people on either side see a vivid golden screen.
feature_bullets: Outside the 60-degree viewing angle, the filter projects a vibrant gold shield
Gold, glossy finish for incredible clarity
Provides a beautiful high-contrast, high-resolution quality you expect
Proprietary gold effect provides premium privacy with a glossy finish
Works with popular 14" Laptops like the Lenovo X1 Carbon with a standard screen. For models with a touchscreen look at the TF140W98B.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars923 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
